title: Sage Organic Vegan Bistro and KindKreme
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Fusion
description: The 2nd Sage restaurant which also houses Kindkreme (raw ice cream, vegan soft serve). Menu here is more extensive than its Echo Park location. Large space with full bar. Food is all-vegan, from sandwiches, grain bowls, and tacos to pizza, variety of starters and salads plus fresh hot pretzels. Honey is used in ice cream (labeled) as well raw honey for sale.
